data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Lubuskie, Poland to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lubuskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Lubuskie, Poland to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Lubuskie, Poland to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: There are 1,010,000 people living in the state of Lubuskie. Only about 3,134 might be believers.
Lord, remember the Jew, Polish-speaking people. Make the Jew, Polish-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, let the threatened of Lubuskie, Poland know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 3,134 believers in the state of Lubuskie the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Lubuskie, Poland.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,
